info.name: userstyles.org Custom - Dark Anime
info.description:
~~~~~IMPORTANT~~~~~
This CSS Code is outdated. I'm currently working on updating it.
Please come back once I'm finished.


This is simple edit for the userstyles.org website that focus on the dark theme with an anime background, an anime cursors and an animated anime message.
I hope you like.
info.additionalInfo: /* CREDITS */ I took the cursors from this pages thanks to their creators : From deviantart by Armor-of-Fire. From Cursors-4u by unknown. /* Updates */ 09/15/2015 - New animated message + background fixes. 06/06/2016 - New forum header (new color + sticking) + various changes on buttons and text zones + background fixes. 06/03/2016 - Ads blocked + new buttons and search bar. 05/10/2016 - Cursors added.
